article: Tomb of Hai Rui is in the western outskirts of Haikou City, it is 5 kilometers from the center of  the city  . It was originally built in 1589  _  the Ming Dynasty (1368-1644), and some of the buildings in the tomb garden are still  _  . It has an area of over 4,000 square meters. Today it is a famous  _  in Hainan Province. Hai Rui was born in 1514 in Hainan Province . He was an offical in the Ming Dynasty . He  was famous for  his honesty and performance of his duty as well as his clean life. One day , an offical was sentenced to death .  _  the emperor liked him very much .He was going to set him  _  . Hearing this , Hai Rui had a coffin for himself and said  _  to his wife . Then he went to the emperor.  At first  he advised him but the emperor didn't agree . Then he argued with him . That made the emperor very  _  . He sent Hai Rui into the prison .  _  he didn't succeed , other people praised him highly and thought he was very  _  . After he came out of prison , he  _  to his hometown and helped with irrigation projects . At the age of 72 , he became an official  _  and worked in Nanjing , and passed away in the third year of his service . On the day of his funeral , people stopped their own matters to  take part in  it and most of them cried . All of them felt very sad .
